game.name: Pixel Castle Runner
game.description: Are you ready for HTML5 game Pixel Castle Runner? In this game you are a little pixel knight, and you have to run and jump over dangerous obstacles! In this game you can prove that you are a true brave knight. LETS GO!!
game.metaTitle: Pixel Castle Runner, Running Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Pixel Castle Runner at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Pixel Castle Runner Game, Action Games, Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game

game.webControlKeys: L CLICKI MOF MOUSE TO JUMP, PRESS THE RIGHT ICON TO SHOOT
